SELECT R.TITLE AS TITLE , R.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION , R.THUMBNAIL AS THUMBNAIL , R.VIDEO_ID AS VIDEO_ID , R.SERVING AS SERVING , R.DURATION AS DURATION , R.LEVEL AS LEVEL , R.TIP AS TIP , R.STATUS AS STATUS , R.CATEGORY_CUISINE_ID AS CATEGORY_CUISINE_ID , R.CATEGORY_PURPOSE_ID AS CATEGORY_PURPOSE_ID , R.CREATE_AT AS CREATE_AT , I.RECIPE_INGREDIENT_ID AS INGREDIENT_ID , I.NAME AS NAME , I.QUANTITY AS QUANTITY , I.REMARK AS REMARK , S.RECIPE_SEQ_ID AS RECIPE_SEQ_ID , S.DESCRIPTION AS SEQ_DESCRIPTION , S.IMAGE AS IMAGE , U.USER_ID AS WRITER_USER_ID , U.NICKNAME AS WRITER_NICKNAME , U.PROFILE_IMAGE AS WRITER_PROFILE_IMAGE
, CASE WHEN RL.USER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS IS_LIKED , CASE WHEN RB.USER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS IS_BOOKMARKED
, FALSE AS iS_LIKED , FALSE AS iS_BOOKMARKED
FROM RECIPE AS R LEFT JOIN RECIPE_INGREDIENT AS I ON R.RECIPE_ID = I.RECIPE_ID LEFT JOIN RECIPE_SEQ AS S ON R.RECIPE_ID = S.RECIPE_ID LEFT JOIN USER AS U ON R.WRITER_ID = U.USER_ID
LEFT JOIN RECIPE_LIKE AS RL ON R.RECIPE_ID = RL.RECIPE_ID LEFT JOIN RECIPE_BOOKMARK AS RB ON R.RECIPE_ID = RB.RECIPE_ID
WHERE R.RECIPE_ID = #{recipeId}

SELECT R.TITLE AS TITLE , R.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION , R.THUMBNAIL AS THUMBNAIL , R.VIDEO_ID AS VIDEO_ID , R.SERVING AS SERVING , R.DURATION AS DURATION , R.LEVEL AS LEVEL , R.TIP AS TIP , R.STATUS AS STATUS , R.CATEGORY_CUISINE_ID AS CATEGORY_CUISINE_ID , R.CATEGORY_PURPOSE_ID AS CATEGORY_PURPOSE_ID , I.RECIPE_INGREDIENT_ID AS INGREDIENT_ID , I.NAME AS NAME , I.QUANTITY AS QUANTITY , I.REMARK AS REMARK , S.RECIPE_SEQ_ID AS RECIPE_SEQ_ID , S.DESCRIPTION AS SEQ_DESCRIPTION , S.IMAGE AS IMAGE FROM RECIPE AS R LEFT JOIN RECIPE_INGREDIENT AS I ON R.RECIPE_ID = I.RECIPE_ID LEFT JOIN RECIPE_SEQ AS S ON R.RECIPE_ID = S.RECIPE_ID WHERE R.RECIPE_ID = #{recipeId} AND R.WRITER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(RL.RECIPE_ID) FROM RECIPE_LIKE AS RL JOIN RECIPE AS R ON RL.RECIPE_ID = R.RECIPE_ID WHERE RL.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(RB.RECIPE_ID) FROM RECIPE_BOOKMARK AS RB JOIN RECIPE AS R ON RB.RECIPE_ID = R.RECIPE_ID WHERE RB.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT R.RECIPE_ID AS RECIPE_ID , R.TITLE AS TITLE , R.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION , R.THUMBNAIL AS THUMBNAIL , R.CREATE_AT AS CREATE_AT , R.STATUS AS IS_STATUS FROM RECIPE_LIKE AS RL JOIN RECIPE AS R ON RL.RECIPE_ID = R.RECIPE_ID WHERE RL.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY RL.CREATE_AT DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT R.RECIPE_ID AS RECIPE_ID , R.TITLE AS TITLE , R.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION , R.THUMBNAIL AS THUMBNAIL , R.CREATE_AT AS CREATE_AT , R.STATUS AS STATUS FROM RECIPE_BOOKMARK AS RB JOIN RECIPE AS R ON RB.RECIPE_ID = R.RECIPE_ID WHERE RB.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY RB.CREATE_AT DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT R.THUMBNAIL AS RECIPE_THUMBNAIL , R.RECIPE_ID AS RECIPE_ID , R.TITLE AS RECIPE_TITLE , R.WRITER_ID AS WRITER_ID , U.NICKNAME AS WRITER_NICKNAME , U.PROFILE_IMAGE AS WRITER_PROFILE_IMAGE , COUNT(DISTINCT C.COMMENT_ID) AS RECIPE_COMMENT_COUNT , COUNT(DISTINCT RL.RECIPE_LIKE_ID) AS RECIPE_LIKE_COUNT FROM RECIPE AS R INNER JOIN USER AS U ON R.WRITER_ID = U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN RECIPE_LIKE AS RL ON R.RECIPE_ID = RL.RECIPE_ID LEFT JOIN COMMENT AS C ON R.RECIPE_ID = C.RECIPE_ID WHERE R.STATUS = #{statusRecipePublic} AND R.RECIPE_ID IN ( SELECT RI.RECIPE_ID FROM RECIPE_INGREDIENT AS RI WHERE RI.NAME IN #{ingredient}
GROUP BY RI.RECIPE_ID HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT RI.NAME) = #{ingredientCount} ) GROUP BY R.RECIPE_ID , R.TITLE , R.WRITER_ID , U.NICKNAME , U.PROFILE_IMAGE LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
